TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit SystemFonts extends System.Object
public ref class SystemFonts abstract sealed

summary.span: Contient des propriétés qui exposent les ressources système relatives aux polices.

span.span: Contains properties that expose the system resources that concern fonts.

Public Shared ReadOnly Property CaptionFontFamily As FontFamily

summary.span: Obtient la métrique qui détermine la famille de polices de la légende de la zone non cliente d'une fenêtre non réduite.

span.span: Gets the metric that determines the font family of the caption of the nonclient area of a nonminimized window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Obtenir la métrique à partir de SPI_GETNONCLIENTMETRICS.Obtain the metric from SPI_GETNONCLIENTMETRICS.
